45bool AchievementCriteriaData::IsValid(AchievementCriteriaEntry const* criteria)
46{
47 if (dataType >= MAX_ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE)
48 {
49 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` for criteria (Entry: %u) contains a wrong data type (%u), ignored.", criteria->ID, dataType);
50 return false;
51 }
52
53 switch (criteria->requiredType)
54 {
55 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILL_CREATURE:
56 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILL_CREATURE_TYPE:
57 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_BG:
58 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATH_IN_DUNGEON:
59 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_FALL_WITHOUT_DYING:
60 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUEST: // only hardcoded list
61 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL:
62 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_RATED_ARENA:
63 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DO_EMOTE:
64 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_SPECIAL_PVP_KILL:
65 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_DUEL:
66 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOOT_TYPE:
67 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL2:
68 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET:
69 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET2:
70 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EQUIP_EPIC_ITEM:
71 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_NEED_ON_LOOT:
72 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_GREED_ON_LOOT:
73 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BG_OBJECTIVE_CAPTURE:
74 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HONORABLE_KILL:
75 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_DAILY_QUEST: // only Children's Week achievements
76 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_USE_ITEM: // only Children's Week achievements
77 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GET_KILLING_BLOWS:
78 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_REACH_LEVEL:
79 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ON_LOGIN:
80 break;
81 default:
82 if (dataType != ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_SCRIPT)
83 {
84 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` contains data for a non-supported criteria type (Entry: %u Type: %u), ignored.", criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType);
85 return false;
86 }
87 break;
88 }
89
90 switch (dataType)
91 {
92 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_NONE:
93 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_INSTANCE_SCRIPT:
94 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_NTH_BIRTHDAY:
95 return true;
96 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_CREATURE:
97 if (!creature.id || !sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(creature.id))
98 {
99 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_CREATURE (%u) contains a non-existing creature id in value1 (%u), ignored.",
100 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, creature.id);
101 return false;
102 }
103 return true;
104 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_PLAYER_CLASS_RACE:
105 if (classRace.class_id && ((1 << (classRace.class_id-1)) & CLASSMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE) == 0)
106 {
107 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_PLAYER_CLASS_RACE (%u) contains a non-existing class in value1 (%u), ignored.",
108 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, classRace.class_id);
109 return false;
110 }
111 if (classRace.race_id && ((1 << (classRace.race_id-1)) & RACEMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE) == 0)
112 {
113 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_PLAYER_CLASS_RACE (%u) contains a non-existing race in value2 (%u), ignored.",
114 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, classRace.race_id);
115 return false;
116 }
117 return true;
118 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_PLAYER_LESS_HEALTH:
119 if (health.percent < 1 || health.percent > 100)
120 {
121 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_PLAYER_LESS_HEALTH (%u) contains a wrong percent value in value1 (%u), ignored.",
122 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, health.percent);
123 return false;
124 }
125 return true;
126 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_PLAYER_DEAD:
127 if (player_dead.own_team_flag > 1)
128 {
129 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_PLAYER_DEAD (%u) contains a wrong boolean value1 (%u).",
130 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, player_dead.own_team_flag);
131 return false;
132 }
133 return true;
134 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_AURA:
135 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_AURA:
136 {
137 SpellInfo const* spellEntry = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(aura.spell_id);
138 if (!spellEntry)
139 {
140 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type %s (%u) contains a wrong spell id in value1 (%u), ignored.",
141 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, (dataType == ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_AURA?"ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_AURA":"ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_AURA"), dataType, aura.spell_id);
142 return false;
143 }
144 if (aura.effect_idx >= 3)
145 {
146 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type %s (%u) contains a wrong spell effect index in value2 (%u), ignored.",
147 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, (dataType == ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_AURA?"ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_AURA":"ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_AURA"), dataType, aura.effect_idx);
148 return false;
149 }
150 if (!spellEntry->Effects[aura.effect_idx].ApplyAuraName)
151 {
152 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type %s (%u) contains a non-aura spell effect (ID: %u Effect: %u), ignored.",
153 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, (dataType == ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_AURA?"ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_AURA":"ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_AURA"), dataType, aura.spell_id, aura.effect_idx);
154 return false;
155 }
156 return true;
157 }
158 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_AREA:
159 if (!sAreaTableStore.LookupEntry(area.id))
160 {
161 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_AREA (%u) contains a wrong area id in value1 (%u), ignored.",
162 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, area.id);
163 return false;
164 }
165 return true;
166 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_VALUE:
167 if (value.compType >= COMP_TYPE_MAX)
168 {
169 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_VALUE (%u) contains a wrong ComparisionType in value2 (%u), ignored.",
170 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, value.compType);
171 return false;
172 }
173 return true;
174 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_LEVEL:
175 if (level.minlevel > STRONG_MAX_LEVEL)
176 {
177 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_LEVEL (%u) contains a wrong minlevel in value1 (%u), ignored.",
178 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, level.minlevel);
179 return false;
180 }
181 return true;
182 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_GENDER:
183 if (gender.gender > GENDER_NONE)
184 {
185 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_GENDER (%u) contains a wrong gender value in value1 (%u), ignored.",
186 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, gender.gender);
187 return false;
188 }
189 return true;
190 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_SCRIPT:
191 if (!ScriptId)
192 {
193 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_SCRIPT (%u) does not have a ScriptName set, ignored.",
194 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType);
195 return false;
196 }
197 return true;
198 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_MAP_DIFFICULTY:
199 if (difficulty.difficulty >= MAX_DIFFICULTY)
200 {
201 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_MAP_DIFFICULTY (%u) contains a wrong difficulty value in value1 (%u), ignored.",
202 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, difficulty.difficulty);
203 return false;
204 }
205 return true;
206 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_MAP_PLAYER_COUNT:
207 if (map_players.maxcount <= 0)
208 {
209 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_MAP_PLAYER_COUNT (%u) contains a wrong max players count in value1 (%u), ignored.",
210 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, map_players.maxcount);
211 return false;
212 }
213 return true;
214 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_TEAM:
215 if (team.team != ALLIANCE && team.team != HORDE)
216 {
217 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_TEAM (%u) contains an unknown team value in value1 (%u), ignored.",
218 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, team.team);
219 return false;
220 }
221 return true;
222 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_DRUNK:
223 if (drunk.state >= MAX_DRUNKEN)
224 {
225 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_DRUNK (%u) contains an unknown drunken state value in value1 (%u), ignored.",
226 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, drunk.state);
227 return false;
228 }
229 return true;
230 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_HOLIDAY:
231 if (!sHolidaysStore.LookupEntry(holiday.id))
232 {
233 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_HOLIDAY (%u) contains an unknown holiday entry in value1 (%u), ignored.",
234 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, holiday.id);
235 return false;
236 }
237 return true;
238 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_BG_LOSS_TEAM_SCORE:
239 return true; // not check correctness node indexes
240 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_EQUIPED_ITEM:
241 if (equipped_item.item_quality >= MAX_ITEM_QUALITY)
242 {
243 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_EQUIPED_ITEM (%u) contains an unknown quality state value in value1 (%u), ignored.",
244 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, equipped_item.item_quality);
245 return false;
246 }
247 return true;
248 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_MAP_ID:
249 if (!sMapStore.LookupEntry(map_id.mapId))
250 {
251 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_MAP_ID (%u) contains an unknown map id in value1 (%u), ignored.",
252 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, map_id.mapId);
253 return false;
254 }
255 return true;
256 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_PLAYER_CLASS_RACE:
257 if (!classRace.class_id && !classRace.race_id)
258 {
259 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_PLAYER_CLASS_RACE (%u) should not have 0 in either value field. Ignored.",
260 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType);
261 return false;
262 }
263 if (classRace.class_id && ((1 << (classRace.class_id-1)) & CLASSMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE) == 0)
264 {
265 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_PLAYER_CLASS_RACE (%u) contains a non-existing class entry in value1 (%u), ignored.",
266 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, classRace.class_id);
267 return false;
268 }
269 if (classRace.race_id && ((1 << (classRace.race_id-1)) & RACEMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE) == 0)
270 {
271 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_PLAYER_CLASS_RACE (%u) contains a non-existing race entry in value2 (%u), ignored.",
272 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, classRace.race_id);
273 return false;
274 }
275 return true;
276 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_KNOWN_TITLE:
277 if (!sCharTitlesStore.LookupEntry(known_title.title_id))
278 {
279 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) for data type ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_KNOWN_TITLE (%u) contains an unknown title_id in value1 (%u), ignore.",
280 criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType, known_title.title_id);
281 return false;
282 }
283 return true;
284 default:
285 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` (Entry: %u Type: %u) contains data of a non-supported data type (%u), ignored.", criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, dataType);
286 return false;
287 }
288}
289
290bool AchievementCriteriaData::Meets(uint32 criteria_id, Player const* source, Unit const* target, uint32 miscvalue1 /*= 0*/) const
291{
292 switch (dataType)
293 {
294 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_NONE:
295 return true;
296 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_CREATURE:
297 if (!target || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
298 return false;
299 return target->GetEntry() == creature.id;
300 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_PLAYER_CLASS_RACE:
301 if (!target || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
302 return false;
303 if (classRace.class_id && classRace.class_id != target->ToPlayer()->getClass())
304 return false;
305 if (classRace.race_id && classRace.race_id != target->ToPlayer()->getRace())
306 return false;
307 return true;
308 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_PLAYER_CLASS_RACE:
309 if (source->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
310 return false;
311 if (classRace.class_id && classRace.class_id != source->ToPlayer()->getClass())
312 return false;
313 if (classRace.race_id && classRace.race_id != source->ToPlayer()->getRace())
314 return false;
315 return true;
316 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_PLAYER_LESS_HEALTH:
317 if (!target || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
318 return false;
319 return !target->HealthAbovePct(health.percent);
320 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_PLAYER_DEAD:
321 if (target && !target->IsAlive())
322 if (const Player* player = target->ToPlayer())
323 if (player->GetDeathTimer() != 0)
324 // flag set == must be same team, not set == different team
325 return (player->GetTeam() == source->GetTeam()) == (player_dead.own_team_flag != 0);
326 return false;
327 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_AURA:
328 return source->HasAuraEffect(aura.spell_id, aura.effect_idx);
329 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_AREA:
330 {
331 uint32 zone_id, area_id;
332 source->GetZoneAndAreaId(zone_id, area_id);
333 return area.id == zone_id || area.id == area_id;
334 }
335 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_AURA:
336 return target && target->HasAuraEffect(aura.spell_id, aura.effect_idx);
337 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_VALUE:
338 return CompareValues(ComparisionType(value.compType), miscvalue1, value.value);
339 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_LEVEL:
340 if (!target)
341 return false;
342 return target->getLevel() >= level.minlevel;
343 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_GENDER:
344 if (!target)
345 return false;
346 return target->getGender() == gender.gender;
347 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_SCRIPT:
348 return sScriptMgr->OnCriteriaCheck(ScriptId, const_cast<Player*>(source), const_cast<Unit*>(target));
349 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_MAP_DIFFICULTY:
350 if (source->GetMap()->IsRaid())
351 if (source->GetMap()->Is25ManRaid() != ((difficulty.difficulty & RAID_DIFFICULTY_MASK_25MAN) != 0))
352 return false;
353 return source->GetMap()->GetSpawnMode() >= difficulty.difficulty;
354 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_MAP_PLAYER_COUNT:
355 return source->GetMap()->GetPlayersCountExceptGMs() <= map_players.maxcount;
356 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_T_TEAM:
357 if (!target || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
358 return false;
359 return target->ToPlayer()->GetTeam() == team.team;
360 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_DRUNK:
361 return Player::GetDrunkenstateByValue(source->GetDrunkValue()) >= DrunkenState(drunk.state);
362 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_HOLIDAY:
363 return IsHolidayActive(HolidayIds(holiday.id));
364 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_BG_LOSS_TEAM_SCORE:
365 {
366 Battleground* bg = source->GetBattleground();
367 if (!bg)
368 return false;
369
370 uint32 score = bg->GetTeamScore(source->GetTeamId() == TEAM_ALLIANCE ? TEAM_HORDE : TEAM_ALLIANCE);
371 return score >= bg_loss_team_score.min_score && score <= bg_loss_team_score.max_score;
372 }
373 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_INSTANCE_SCRIPT:
374 {
375 if (!source->IsInWorld())
376 return false;
377 Map* map = source->GetMap();
378 if (!map->IsDungeon())
379 {
380 TC_LOG_ERROR("achievement", "Achievement system call ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_INSTANCE_SCRIPT (%u) for achievement criteria %u in a non-dungeon/non-raid map %u",
381 dataType, criteria_id, map->GetId());
382 return false;
383 }
384 InstanceScript* instance = map->ToInstanceMap()->GetInstanceScript();
385 if (!instance)
386 {
387 TC_LOG_ERROR("achievement", "Achievement system call ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_INSTANCE_SCRIPT (%u) for achievement criteria %u in map %u, but the map does not have an instance script.",
388 dataType, criteria_id, map->GetId());
389 return false;
390 }
391 return instance->CheckAchievementCriteriaMeet(criteria_id, source, target, miscvalue1);
392 }
393 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_EQUIPED_ITEM:
394 {
395 ItemTemplate const* pProto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(miscvalue1);
396 if (!pProto)
397 return false;
398 return pProto->ItemLevel >= equipped_item.item_level && pProto->Quality >= equipped_item.item_quality;
399 }
400 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_MAP_ID:
401 return source->GetMapId() == map_id.mapId;
402 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_NTH_BIRTHDAY:
403 {
404 time_t birthday_start = time_t(sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_BIRTHDAY_TIME));
405 tm birthday_tm;
406 localtime_r(&birthday_start, &birthday_tm);
407
408 // exactly N birthday
409 birthday_tm.tm_year += birthday_login.nth_birthday;
410
411 time_t birthday = mktime(&birthday_tm);
412 time_t now = sWorld->GetGameTime();
413 return now <= birthday + DAY && now >= birthday;
414 }
415 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_S_KNOWN_TITLE:
416 {
417 if (CharTitlesEntry const* titleInfo = sCharTitlesStore.LookupEntry(known_title.title_id))
418 return source->HasTitle(titleInfo->bit_index);
419 return false;
420 }
421 default:
422 break;
423 }
424 return false;
425}
426
427bool AchievementCriteriaDataSet::Meets(Player const* source, Unit const* target, uint32 miscvalue /*= 0*/) const
428{
429 for (Storage::const_iterator itr = storage.begin(); itr != storage.end(); ++itr)
430 if (!itr->Meets(criteria_id, source, target, miscvalue))
431 return false;
432
433 return true;
434}
435
436AchievementMgr::AchievementMgr(Player* player)
437{
438 m_player = player;
439}
440
441AchievementMgr::~AchievementMgr() { }
442
443void AchievementMgr::Reset()
444{
445 for (CompletedAchievementMap::const_iterator iter = m_completedAchievements.begin(); iter != m_completedAchievements.end(); ++iter)
446 {
447 WorldPacket data(SMSG_ACHIEVEMENT_DELETED, 4);
448 data << uint32(iter->first);
449 m_player->SendDirectMessage(&data);
450 }
451
452 for (CriteriaProgressMap::const_iterator iter = m_criteriaProgress.begin(); iter != m_criteriaProgress.end(); ++iter)
453 {
454 WorldPacket data(SMSG_CRITERIA_DELETED, 4);
455 data << uint32(iter->first);
456 m_player->SendDirectMessage(&data);
457 }
458
459 m_completedAchievements.clear();
460 m_criteriaProgress.clear();
461 DeleteFromDB(m_player->GetGUID());
462
463 // re-fill data
464 CheckAllAchievementCriteria();
465}
466
467void AchievementMgr::ResetAchievementCriteria(AchievementCriteriaTypes type, uint32 miscvalue1, uint32 miscvalue2, bool evenIfCriteriaComplete)
468{
469 TC_LOG_DEBUG("achievement", "AchievementMgr::ResetAchievementCriteria(%u, %u, %u)", type, miscvalue1, miscvalue2);
470
471 // disable for gamemasters with GM-mode enabled
472 if (m_player->IsGameMaster())
473 return;
474
475 AchievementCriteriaEntryList const& achievementCriteriaList = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievementCriteriaByType(type);
476 for (AchievementCriteriaEntryList::const_iterator i = achievementCriteriaList.begin(); i != achievementCriteriaList.end(); ++i)
477 {
478 AchievementCriteriaEntry const* achievementCriteria = (*i);
479
480 AchievementEntry const* achievement = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievement(achievementCriteria->referredAchievement);
481 if (!achievement)
482 continue;
483
484 // don't update already completed criteria if not forced or achievement already complete
485 if ((IsCompletedCriteria(achievementCriteria, achievement) && !evenIfCriteriaComplete) || HasAchieved(achievement->ID))
486 continue;
487
488 for (uint8 j = 0; j < MAX_CRITERIA_REQUIREMENTS; ++j)
489 if (achievementCriteria->additionalRequirements[j].additionalRequirement_type == miscvalue1 &&
490 (!achievementCriteria->additionalRequirements[j].additionalRequirement_value ||
491 achievementCriteria->additionalRequirements[j].additionalRequirement_value == miscvalue2))
492 {
493 RemoveCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria);
494 break;
495 }
496 }
497}
498
499void AchievementMgr::DeleteFromDB(ObjectGuid guid)
500{
501 SQLTransaction trans = CharacterDatabase.BeginTransaction();
502
503 PreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_DEL_CHAR_ACHIEVEMENT);
504 stmt->setUInt32(0, guid.GetCounter());
505 trans->Append(stmt);
506
507 stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_DEL_CHAR_ACHIEVEMENT_PROGRESS);
508 stmt->setUInt32(0, guid.GetCounter());
509 trans->Append(stmt);
510
511 CharacterDatabase.CommitTransaction(trans);
512}
513
514void AchievementMgr::SaveToDB(SQLTransaction& trans)
515{
516 if (!m_completedAchievements.empty())
517 {
518 for (CompletedAchievementMap::iterator iter = m_completedAchievements.begin(); iter != m_completedAchievements.end(); ++iter)
519 {
520 if (!iter->second.changed)
521 continue;
522
523 PreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_DEL_CHAR_ACHIEVEMENT_BY_ACHIEVEMENT);
524 stmt->setUInt16(0, iter->first);
525 stmt->setUInt32(1, GetPlayer()->GetGUID().GetCounter());
526 trans->Append(stmt);
527
528 stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_INS_CHAR_ACHIEVEMENT);
529 stmt->setUInt32(0, GetPlayer()->GetGUID().GetCounter());
530 stmt->setUInt16(1, iter->first);
531 stmt->setUInt32(2, uint32(iter->second.date));
532 trans->Append(stmt);
533
534 iter->second.changed = false;
535 }
536 }
537
538 if (!m_criteriaProgress.empty())
539 {
540 for (CriteriaProgressMap::iterator iter = m_criteriaProgress.begin(); iter != m_criteriaProgress.end(); ++iter)
541 {
542 if (!iter->second.changed)
543 continue;
544
545 PreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_DEL_CHAR_ACHIEVEMENT_PROGRESS_BY_CRITERIA);
546 stmt->setUInt32(0, GetPlayer()->GetGUID().GetCounter());
547 stmt->setUInt16(1, iter->first);
548 trans->Append(stmt);
549
550 if (iter->second.counter)
551 {
552 stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_INS_CHAR_ACHIEVEMENT_PROGRESS);
553 stmt->setUInt32(0, GetPlayer()->GetGUID().GetCounter());
554 stmt->setUInt16(1, iter->first);
555 stmt->setUInt32(2, iter->second.counter);
556 stmt->setUInt32(3, uint32(iter->second.date));
557 trans->Append(stmt);
558 }
559
560 iter->second.changed = false;
561 }
562 }
563}
564
565void AchievementMgr::LoadFromDB(PreparedQueryResult achievementResult, PreparedQueryResult criteriaResult)
566{
567 if (achievementResult)
568 {
569 do
570 {
571 Field* fields = achievementResult->Fetch();
572 uint32 achievementid = fields[0].GetUInt16();
573
574 // must not happen: cleanup at server startup in sAchievementMgr->LoadCompletedAchievements()
575 AchievementEntry const* achievement = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievement(achievementid);
576 if (!achievement)
577 continue;
578
579 CompletedAchievementData& ca = m_completedAchievements[achievementid];
580 ca.date = time_t(fields[1].GetUInt32());
581 ca.changed = false;
582
583 // title achievement rewards are retroactive
584 if (AchievementReward const* reward = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievementReward(achievement))
585 if (uint32 titleId = reward->titleId[Player::TeamForRace(GetPlayer()->getRace()) == ALLIANCE ? 0 : 1])
586 if (CharTitlesEntry const* titleEntry = sCharTitlesStore.LookupEntry(titleId))
587 GetPlayer()->SetTitle(titleEntry);
588
589 } while (achievementResult->NextRow());
590 }
591
592 if (criteriaResult)
593 {
594 do
595 {
596 Field* fields = criteriaResult->Fetch();
597 uint32 id = fields[0].GetUInt16();
598 uint32 counter = fields[1].GetUInt32();
599 time_t date = time_t(fields[2].GetUInt32());
600
601 AchievementCriteriaEntry const* criteria = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievementCriteria(id);
602 if (!criteria)
603 {
604 // Removing non-existing criteria data for all characters
605 TC_LOG_ERROR("achievement", "Non-existing achievement criteria %u data has been removed from the table `character_achievement_progress`.", id);
606
607 PreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_DEL_INVALID_ACHIEV_PROGRESS_CRITERIA);
608
609 stmt->setUInt16(0, uint16(id));
610
611 CharacterDatabase.Execute(stmt);
612
613 continue;
614 }
615
616 if (criteria->timeLimit && time_t(date + criteria->timeLimit) < time(NULL))
617 continue;
618
619 CriteriaProgress& progress = m_criteriaProgress[id];
620 progress.counter = counter;
621 progress.date = date;
622 progress.changed = false;
623 } while (criteriaResult->NextRow());
624 }
625}
626
627void AchievementMgr::SendAchievementEarned(AchievementEntry const* achievement) const
628{
629 if (GetPlayer()->GetSession()->PlayerLoading())
630 return;
631
632 // Don't send for achievements with ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_TRACKING
633 if (achievement->flags & ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_HIDDEN)
634 return;
635
636 #ifdef TRINITY_DEBUG
637 TC_LOG_DEBUG("achievement", "AchievementMgr::SendAchievementEarned(%u)", achievement->ID);
638 #endif
639
640 if (Guild* guild = sGuildMgr->GetGuildById(GetPlayer()->GetGuildId()))
641 {
642 Trinity::BroadcastTextBuilder _builder(GetPlayer(), CHAT_MSG_GUILD_ACHIEVEMENT, BROADCAST_TEXT_ACHIEVEMENT_EARNED, GetPlayer(), achievement->ID);
643 Trinity::LocalizedPacketDo<Trinity::BroadcastTextBuilder> _localizer(_builder);
644 guild->BroadcastWorker(_localizer, GetPlayer());
645 }
646
647 if (achievement->flags & (ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_REALM_FIRST_KILL | ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_REALM_FIRST_REACH))
648 {
649 // broadcast realm first reached
650 WorldPacket data(SMSG_SERVER_FIRST_ACHIEVEMENT, GetPlayer()->GetName().size() + 1 + 8 + 4 + 4);
651 data << GetPlayer()->GetName();
652 data << uint64(GetPlayer()->GetGUID());
653 data << uint32(achievement->ID);
654 data << uint32(0); // 1=link supplied string as player name, 0=display plain string
655 sWorld->SendGlobalMessage(&data);
656 }
657 // if player is in world he can tell his friends about new achievement
658 else if (GetPlayer()->IsInWorld())
659 {
660 Trinity::BroadcastTextBuilder _builder(GetPlayer(), CHAT_MSG_ACHIEVEMENT, BROADCAST_TEXT_ACHIEVEMENT_EARNED, GetPlayer(), achievement->ID);
661 Trinity::LocalizedPacketDo<Trinity::BroadcastTextBuilder> _localizer(_builder);
662 Trinity::PlayerDistWorker<Trinity::LocalizedPacketDo<Trinity::BroadcastTextBuilder> > _worker(GetPlayer(), sWorld->getFloatConfig(CONFIG_LISTEN_RANGE_SAY), _localizer);
663 GetPlayer()->VisitNearbyWorldObject(sWorld->getFloatConfig(CONFIG_LISTEN_RANGE_SAY), _worker);
664 }
665
666 WorldPacket data(SMSG_ACHIEVEMENT_EARNED, 8+4+8);
667 data << GetPlayer()->GetPackGUID();
668 data << uint32(achievement->ID);
669 data.AppendPackedTime(time(NULL));
670 data << uint32(0);
671 GetPlayer()->SendMessageToSetInRange(&data, sWorld->getFloatConfig(CONFIG_LISTEN_RANGE_SAY), true);
672}
673
674void AchievementMgr::SendCriteriaUpdate(AchievementCriteriaEntry const* entry, CriteriaProgress const* progress, uint32 timeElapsed, bool timedCompleted) const
675{
676 WorldPacket data(SMSG_CRITERIA_UPDATE, 8+4+8);
677 data << uint32(entry->ID);
678
679 // the counter is packed like a packed Guid
680 data.appendPackGUID(progress->counter);
681
682 data << GetPlayer()->GetPackGUID();
683 if (!entry->timeLimit)
684 data << uint32(0);
685 else
686 data << uint32(timedCompleted ? 1 : 0); // this are some flags, 1 is for keeping the counter at 0 in client
687 data.AppendPackedTime(progress->date);
688 data << uint32(timeElapsed); // time elapsed in seconds
689 data << uint32(0); // unk
690 GetPlayer()->SendDirectMessage(&data);
691}
692
693/**
694 * called at player login. The player might have fulfilled some achievements when the achievement system wasn't working yet
695 */
696void AchievementMgr::CheckAllAchievementCriteria()
697{
698 // suppress sending packets
699 for (uint32 i=0; i<ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_TOTAL; ++i)
700 UpdateAchievementCriteria(AchievementCriteriaTypes(i));
701}
702
703static const uint32 achievIdByArenaSlot[MAX_ARENA_SLOT] = { 1057, 1107, 1108 };
704
705/**
706 * this function will be called whenever the user might have done a criteria relevant action
707 */
708void AchievementMgr::UpdateAchievementCriteria(AchievementCriteriaTypes type, uint32 miscValue1 /*= 0*/, uint32 miscValue2 /*= 0*/, Unit* unit /*= NULL*/)
709{
710 if (type >= ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_TOTAL)
711 {
712 TC_LOG_DEBUG("achievement", "UpdateAchievementCriteria: Wrong criteria type %u", type);
713 return;
714 }
715
716 // disable for gamemasters with GM-mode enabled
717 if (m_player->IsGameMaster())
718 {
719 TC_LOG_DEBUG("achievement", "UpdateAchievementCriteria: [Player %s GM mode on] %s, %s (%u), %u, %u"
720 , m_player->GetName().c_str(), m_player->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), AchievementGlobalMgr::GetCriteriaTypeString(type), type, miscValue1, miscValue2);
721 return;
722 }
723
724 TC_LOG_DEBUG("achievement", "UpdateAchievementCriteria: %s, %s (%u), %u, %u"
725 , m_player->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), AchievementGlobalMgr::GetCriteriaTypeString(type), type, miscValue1, miscValue2);
726
727 AchievementCriteriaEntryList const& achievementCriteriaList = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievementCriteriaByType(type);
728 for (AchievementCriteriaEntry const* achievementCriteria : achievementCriteriaList)
729 {
730 AchievementEntry const* achievement = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievement(achievementCriteria->referredAchievement);
731 if (!achievement)
732 continue;
733
734 if (!CanUpdateCriteria(achievementCriteria, achievement, miscValue1, miscValue2, unit))
735 continue;
736
737 switch (type)
738 {
739 // special cases, db data is checked later
740 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_RATED_ARENA:
741 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_NEED_ON_LOOT:
742 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_GREED_ON_LOOT:
743 break;
744 default:
745 if (AchievementCriteriaDataSet const* data = sAchievementMgr->GetCriteriaDataSet(achievementCriteria))
746 if (!data->Meets(GetPlayer(), unit, miscValue1))
747 continue;
748 break;
749 }
750
751 switch (type)
752 {
753 // std. case: increment at 1
754 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_DAILY_QUEST:
755 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATH_AT_MAP:
756 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATH:
757 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATH_IN_DUNGEON:
758 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILLED_BY_CREATURE:
759 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILLED_BY_PLAYER:
760 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATHS_FROM:
761 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET:
762 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL:
763 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BG_OBJECTIVE_CAPTURE:
764 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HONORABLE_KILL_AT_AREA:
765 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_ARENA: // This also behaves like ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_RATED_ARENA
766 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HONORABLE_KILL:
767 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_USE_ITEM:
768 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HK_CLASS:
769 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HK_RACE:
770 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DO_EMOTE:
771 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GET_KILLING_BLOWS:
772 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_NUMBER_OF_TALENT_RESETS:
773 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_USE_GAMEOBJECT:
774 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET2:
775 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_SPECIAL_PVP_KILL:
776 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_FISH_IN_GAMEOBJECT:
777 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ON_LOGIN:
778 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_DUEL:
779 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOSE_DUEL:
780 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CREATE_AUCTION:
781 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WON_AUCTIONS: /* FIXME: for online player only currently */
782 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOOT_EPIC_ITEM:
783 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_RECEIVE_EPIC_ITEM:
784 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_NEED:
785 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_GREED:
786 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_QUEST_ABANDONED:
787 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_FLIGHT_PATHS_TAKEN:
788 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL2:
789 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ACCEPTED_SUMMONINGS:
790 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_USE_LFD_TO_GROUP_WITH_PLAYERS:
791 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, 1, PROGRESS_ACCUMULATE);
792 break;
793 // std case: increment at miscvalue1
794 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_BG:
795 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DAMAGE_DONE:
796 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_BATTLEGROUND:
797 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HEALING_DONE:
798 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_MONEY_FROM_VENDORS:
799 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GOLD_SPENT_FOR_TALENTS:
800 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_MONEY_FROM_QUEST_REWARD:
801 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GOLD_SPENT_FOR_TRAVELLING:
802 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GOLD_SPENT_AT_BARBER:
803 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GOLD_SPENT_FOR_MAIL:
804 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOOT_MONEY:
805 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GOLD_EARNED_BY_AUCTIONS: /* FIXME: for online player only currently */
806 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_TOTAL_DAMAGE_RECEIVED:
807 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_TOTAL_HEALING_RECEIVED:
808 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, miscValue1, PROGRESS_ACCUMULATE);
809 break;
810 // std case: increment at miscvalue2
811 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILL_CREATURE:
812 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_OWN_ITEM:
813 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOOT_ITEM:
814 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILL_CREATURE_TYPE:
815 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOOT_TYPE:
816 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, miscValue2, PROGRESS_ACCUMULATE);
817 break;
818 // std case: high value at miscvalue1
819 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_AUCTION_BID:
820 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_AUCTION_SOLD: /* FIXME: for online player only currently */
821 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_HIT_DEALT:
822 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_HIT_RECEIVED:
823 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_HEAL_CAST:
824 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_HEALING_RECEIVED:
825 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, miscValue1, PROGRESS_HIGHEST);
826 break;
827 // std. case: set at 1
828 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUEST:
829 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LEARN_SPELL:
830 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EXPLORE_AREA:
831 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_VISIT_BARBER_SHOP:
832 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EQUIP_EPIC_ITEM:
833 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EQUIP_ITEM:
834 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, 1, PROGRESS_SET);
835 break;
836
837 // specialized cases
838 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_REACH_LEVEL:
839 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, GetPlayer()->getLevel());
840 break;
841 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_REACH_SKILL_LEVEL:
842 if (uint32 skillvalue = GetPlayer()->GetBaseSkillValue(achievementCriteria->reach_skill_level.skillID))
843 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, skillvalue);
844 break;
845 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LEARN_SKILL_LEVEL:
846 if (uint32 maxSkillvalue = GetPlayer()->GetPureMaxSkillValue(achievementCriteria->learn_skill_level.skillID))
847 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, maxSkillvalue);
848 break;
849 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_ACHIEVEMENT:
850 if (m_completedAchievements.find(achievementCriteria->complete_achievement.linkedAchievement) != m_completedAchievements.end())
851 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, 1);
852 break;
853 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUEST_COUNT:
854 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, GetPlayer()->GetRewardedQuestCount());
855 break;
856 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_DAILY_QUEST_DAILY:
857 {
858 time_t nextDailyResetTime = sWorld->GetNextDailyQuestsResetTime();
859 CriteriaProgress const* progress = GetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria);
860
861 if (!miscValue1) // Login case.
862 {
863 // reset if player missed one day.
864 if (progress && progress->date < (nextDailyResetTime - 2 * DAY))
865 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, 0, PROGRESS_SET);
866 continue;
867 }
868
869 ProgressType progressType;
870 if (!progress)
871 // 1st time. Start count.
872 progressType = PROGRESS_SET;
873 else if (progress->date < (nextDailyResetTime - 2 * DAY))
874 // last progress is older than 2 days. Player missed 1 day => Retart count.
875 progressType = PROGRESS_SET;
876 else if (progress->date < (nextDailyResetTime - DAY))
877 // last progress is between 1 and 2 days. => 1st time of the day.
878 progressType = PROGRESS_ACCUMULATE;
879 else
880 // last progress is within the day before the reset => Already counted today.
881 continue;
882
883 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, 1, progressType);
884 break;
885 }
886 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUESTS_IN_ZONE:
887 {
888 uint32 counter = 0;
889
890 const RewardedQuestSet &rewQuests = GetPlayer()->getRewardedQuests();
891 for (RewardedQuestSet::const_iterator itr = rewQuests.begin(); itr != rewQuests.end(); ++itr)
892 {
893 Quest const* quest = sObjectMgr->GetQuestTemplate(*itr);
894 if (quest && quest->GetZoneOrSort() >= 0 && uint32(quest->GetZoneOrSort()) == achievementCriteria->complete_quests_in_zone.zoneID)
895 ++counter;
896 }
897 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, counter);
898 break;
899 }
900 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_FALL_WITHOUT_DYING:
901 // miscvalue1 is the ingame fallheight*100 as stored in dbc
902 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, miscValue1);
903 break;
904 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_RATED_ARENA:
905 // additional requirements
906 if (achievementCriteria->additionalRequirements[0].additionalRequirement_type == ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_CONDITION_NO_LOSE)
907 {
908 // those requirements couldn't be found in the dbc
909 AchievementCriteriaDataSet const* data = sAchievementMgr->GetCriteriaDataSet(achievementCriteria);
910 if (!data || !data->Meets(GetPlayer(), unit, miscValue1))
911 {
912 // reset the progress as we have a win without the requirement.
913 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, 0);
914 continue;
915 }
916 }
917
918 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, 1, PROGRESS_ACCUMULATE);
919 break;
920 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BUY_BANK_SLOT:
921 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, GetPlayer()->GetBankBagSlotCount());
922 break;
923 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GAIN_REPUTATION:
924 {
925 int32 reputation = GetPlayer()->GetReputationMgr().GetReputation(achievementCriteria->gain_reputation.factionID);
926 if (reputation > 0)
927 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, reputation);
928 break;
929 }
930 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GAIN_EXALTED_REPUTATION:
931 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, GetPlayer()->GetReputationMgr().GetExaltedFactionCount());
932 break;
933 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_NEED_ON_LOOT:
934 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_GREED_ON_LOOT:
935 {
936 ItemTemplate const* proto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(miscValue1);
937 if (!proto)
938 continue;
939
940 // check item level via achievement_criteria_data
941 AchievementCriteriaDataSet const* data = sAchievementMgr->GetCriteriaDataSet(achievementCriteria);
942 if (!data || !data->Meets(GetPlayer(), nullptr, proto->ItemLevel))
943 continue;
944
945 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, 1, PROGRESS_ACCUMULATE);
946 break;
947 }
948 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LEARN_SKILLLINE_SPELLS:
949 {
950 uint32 spellCount = 0;
951 for (PlayerSpellMap::const_iterator spellIter = GetPlayer()->GetSpellMap().begin();
952 spellIter != GetPlayer()->GetSpellMap().end();
953 ++spellIter)
954 {
955 SkillLineAbilityMapBounds bounds = sSpellMgr->GetSkillLineAbilityMapBounds(spellIter->first);
956 for (SkillLineAbilityMap::const_iterator skillIter = bounds.first; skillIter != bounds.second; ++skillIter)
957 {
958 if (skillIter->second->skillId == achievementCriteria->learn_skillline_spell.skillLine)
959 spellCount++;
960 }
961 }
962 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, spellCount);
963 break;
964 }
965 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GAIN_REVERED_REPUTATION:
966 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, GetPlayer()->GetReputationMgr().GetReveredFactionCount());
967 break;
968 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GAIN_HONORED_REPUTATION:
969 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, GetPlayer()->GetReputationMgr().GetHonoredFactionCount());
970 break;
971 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KNOWN_FACTIONS:
972 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, GetPlayer()->GetReputationMgr().GetVisibleFactionCount());
973 break;
974 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LEARN_SKILL_LINE:
975 {
976 uint32 spellCount = 0;
977 for (PlayerSpellMap::const_iterator spellIter = GetPlayer()->GetSpellMap().begin();
978 spellIter != GetPlayer()->GetSpellMap().end();
979 ++spellIter)
980 {
981 SkillLineAbilityMapBounds bounds = sSpellMgr->GetSkillLineAbilityMapBounds(spellIter->first);
982 for (SkillLineAbilityMap::const_iterator skillIter = bounds.first; skillIter != bounds.second; ++skillIter)
983 if (skillIter->second->skillId == achievementCriteria->learn_skill_line.skillLine)
984 spellCount++;
985 }
986 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, spellCount);
987 break;
988 }
989 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EARN_HONORABLE_KILL:
990 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, GetPlayer()->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_FIELD_LIFETIME_HONORABLE_KILLS));
991 break;
992 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_GOLD_VALUE_OWNED:
993 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, GetPlayer()->GetMoney(), PROGRESS_HIGHEST);
994 break;
995 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EARN_ACHIEVEMENT_POINTS:
996 if (!miscValue1)
997 {
998 uint32 points = 0;
999 for (CompletedAchievementMap::const_iterator itr = m_completedAchievements.begin(); itr != m_completedAchievements.end(); ++itr)
1000 if (AchievementEntry const* completedAchievements = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievement(itr->first))
1001 points += completedAchievements->points;
1002 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, points, PROGRESS_SET);
1003 }
1004 else
1005 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, miscValue1, PROGRESS_ACCUMULATE);
1006 break;
1007 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_TEAM_RATING:
1008 {
1009 uint32 reqTeamType = achievementCriteria->highest_team_rating.teamtype;
1010
1011 if (miscValue1)
1012 {
1013 if (miscValue2 != reqTeamType)
1014 continue;
1015
1016 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, miscValue1, PROGRESS_HIGHEST);
1017 }
1018 else // login case
1019 {
1020 for (uint32 arena_slot = 0; arena_slot < MAX_ARENA_SLOT; ++arena_slot)
1021 {
1022 uint32 teamId = GetPlayer()->GetArenaTeamId(arena_slot);
1023 if (!teamId)
1024 continue;
1025
1026 ArenaTeam* team = sArenaTeamMgr->GetArenaTeamById(teamId);
1027 if (!team || team->GetType() != reqTeamType)
1028 continue;
1029
1030 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, team->GetStats().Rating, PROGRESS_HIGHEST);
1031 break;
1032 }
1033 }
1034 break;
1035 }
1036 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_PERSONAL_RATING:
1037 {
1038 uint32 reqTeamType = achievementCriteria->highest_personal_rating.teamtype;
1039
1040 if (miscValue1)
1041 {
1042 if (miscValue2 != reqTeamType)
1043 continue;
1044
1045 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, miscValue1, PROGRESS_HIGHEST);
1046 }
1047 else // login case
1048 {
1049 for (uint32 arena_slot = 0; arena_slot < MAX_ARENA_SLOT; ++arena_slot)
1050 {
1051 uint32 teamId = GetPlayer()->GetArenaTeamId(arena_slot);
1052 if (!teamId)
1053 continue;
1054
1055 ArenaTeam* team = sArenaTeamMgr->GetArenaTeamById(teamId);
1056 if (!team || team->GetType() != reqTeamType)
1057 continue;
1058
1059 if (ArenaTeamMember const* member = team->GetMember(GetPlayer()->GetGUID()))
1060 {
1061 SetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria, member->PersonalRating, PROGRESS_HIGHEST);
1062 break;
1063 }
1064 }
1065 }
1066
1067 break;
1068 }
1069 // std case: does not exist in DBC, not triggered in code as result
1070 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_HEALTH:
1071 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_SPELLPOWER:
1072 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_ARMOR:
1073 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_POWER:
1074 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_STAT:
1075 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_RATING:
1076 break;
1077 // FIXME: not triggered in code as result, need to implement
1078 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_RAID:
1079 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_PLAY_ARENA:
1080 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_OWN_RANK:
1081 break; // Not implemented yet :(
1082 }
1083
1084 if (IsCompletedCriteria(achievementCriteria, achievement))
1085 CompletedCriteriaFor(achievement);
1086
1087 // check again the completeness for SUMM and REQ COUNT achievements,
1088 // as they don't depend on the completed criteria but on the sum of the progress of each individual criteria
1089 if (achievement->flags & ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_SUMM)
1090 if (IsCompletedAchievement(achievement))
1091 CompletedAchievement(achievement);
1092
1093 if (AchievementEntryList const* achRefList = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievementByReferencedId(achievement->ID))
1094 for (AchievementEntryList::const_iterator itr = achRefList->begin(); itr != achRefList->end(); ++itr)
1095 if (IsCompletedAchievement(*itr))
1096 CompletedAchievement(*itr);
1097 }
1098}
1099
1100bool AchievementMgr::IsCompletedCriteria(AchievementCriteriaEntry const* achievementCriteria, AchievementEntry const* achievement)
1101{
1102 if (!achievement)
1103 return false;
1104
1105 // counter can never complete
1106 if (achievement->flags & ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_COUNTER)
1107 return false;
1108
1109 if (achievement->flags & (ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_REALM_FIRST_REACH | ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_REALM_FIRST_KILL))
1110 {
1111 // someone on this realm has already completed that achievement
1112 if (sAchievementMgr->IsRealmCompleted(achievement, GetPlayer()->GetInstanceId()))
1113 return false;
1114 }
1115
1116 CriteriaProgress const* progress = GetCriteriaProgress(achievementCriteria);
1117 if (!progress)
1118 return false;
1119
1120 switch (achievementCriteria->requiredType)
1121 {
1122 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_BG:
1123 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->win_bg.winCount;
1124 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILL_CREATURE:
1125 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->kill_creature.creatureCount;
1126 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_REACH_LEVEL:
1127 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->reach_level.level;
1128 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_REACH_SKILL_LEVEL:
1129 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->reach_skill_level.skillLevel;
1130 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_ACHIEVEMENT:
1131 return progress->counter >= 1;
1132 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUEST_COUNT:
1133 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->complete_quest_count.totalQuestCount;
1134 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_DAILY_QUEST_DAILY:
1135 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->complete_daily_quest_daily.numberOfDays;
1136 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUESTS_IN_ZONE:
1137 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->complete_quests_in_zone.questCount;
1138 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DAMAGE_DONE:
1139 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HEALING_DONE:
1140 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->healing_done.count;
1141 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_DAILY_QUEST:
1142 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->complete_daily_quest.questCount;
1143 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_FALL_WITHOUT_DYING:
1144 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->fall_without_dying.fallHeight;
1145 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUEST:
1146 return progress->counter >= 1;
1147 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET:
1148 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET2:
1149 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->be_spell_target.spellCount;
1150 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL:
1151 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL2:
1152 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->cast_spell.castCount;
1153 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BG_OBJECTIVE_CAPTURE:
1154 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->bg_objective.completeCount;
1155 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HONORABLE_KILL_AT_AREA:
1156 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->honorable_kill_at_area.killCount;
1157 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LEARN_SPELL:
1158 return progress->counter >= 1;
1159 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HONORABLE_KILL:
1160 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EARN_HONORABLE_KILL:
1161 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->honorable_kill.killCount;
1162 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_OWN_ITEM:
1163 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->own_item.itemCount;
1164 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_RATED_ARENA:
1165 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->win_rated_arena.count;
1166 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_PERSONAL_RATING:
1167 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->highest_personal_rating.PersonalRating;
1168 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LEARN_SKILL_LEVEL:
1169 return progress->counter >= (achievementCriteria->learn_skill_level.skillLevel * 75);
1170 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_USE_ITEM:
1171 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->use_item.itemCount;
1172 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOOT_ITEM:
1173 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->loot_item.itemCount;
1174 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EXPLORE_AREA:
1175 return progress->counter >= 1;
1176 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BUY_BANK_SLOT:
1177 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->buy_bank_slot.numberOfSlots;
1178 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GAIN_REPUTATION:
1179 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->gain_reputation.reputationAmount;
1180 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GAIN_EXALTED_REPUTATION:
1181 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->gain_exalted_reputation.numberOfExaltedFactions;
1182 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_VISIT_BARBER_SHOP:
1183 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->visit_barber.numberOfVisits;
1184 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EQUIP_EPIC_ITEM:
1185 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->equip_epic_item.count;
1186 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_NEED_ON_LOOT:
1187 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_GREED_ON_LOOT:
1188 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->roll_greed_on_loot.count;
1189 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HK_CLASS:
1190 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->hk_class.count;
1191 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HK_RACE:
1192 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->hk_race.count;
1193 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DO_EMOTE:
1194 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->do_emote.count;
1195 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EQUIP_ITEM:
1196 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->equip_item.count;
1197 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_MONEY_FROM_QUEST_REWARD:
1198 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->quest_reward_money.goldInCopper;
1199 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOOT_MONEY:
1200 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->loot_money.goldInCopper;
1201 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_USE_GAMEOBJECT:
1202 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->use_gameobject.useCount;
1203 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_SPECIAL_PVP_KILL:
1204 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->special_pvp_kill.killCount;
1205 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_FISH_IN_GAMEOBJECT:
1206 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->fish_in_gameobject.lootCount;
1207 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LEARN_SKILLLINE_SPELLS:
1208 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->learn_skillline_spell.spellCount;
1209 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_DUEL:
1210 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->win_duel.duelCount;
1211 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOOT_TYPE:
1212 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->loot_type.lootTypeCount;
1213 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LEARN_SKILL_LINE:
1214 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->learn_skill_line.spellCount;
1215 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EARN_ACHIEVEMENT_POINTS:
1216 return progress->counter >= 9000;
1217 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_USE_LFD_TO_GROUP_WITH_PLAYERS:
1218 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->use_lfg.dungeonsComplete;
1219 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GET_KILLING_BLOWS:
1220 return progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->get_killing_blow.killCount;
1221 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_ARENA:
1222 return achievementCriteria->win_arena.count && progress->counter >= achievementCriteria->win_arena.count;
1223 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ON_LOGIN:
1224 return true;
1225 // handle all statistic-only criteria here
1226 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_BATTLEGROUND:
1227 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATH_AT_MAP:
1228 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATH:
1229 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATH_IN_DUNGEON:
1230 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILLED_BY_CREATURE:
1231 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILLED_BY_PLAYER:
1232 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATHS_FROM:
1233 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_TEAM_RATING:
1234 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_MONEY_FROM_VENDORS:
1235 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GOLD_SPENT_FOR_TALENTS:
1236 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_NUMBER_OF_TALENT_RESETS:
1237 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GOLD_SPENT_AT_BARBER:
1238 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GOLD_SPENT_FOR_MAIL:
1239 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOSE_DUEL:
1240 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILL_CREATURE_TYPE:
1241 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GOLD_EARNED_BY_AUCTIONS:
1242 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CREATE_AUCTION:
1243 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_AUCTION_BID:
1244 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_AUCTION_SOLD:
1245 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_GOLD_VALUE_OWNED:
1246 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WON_AUCTIONS:
1247 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GAIN_REVERED_REPUTATION:
1248 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GAIN_HONORED_REPUTATION:
1249 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KNOWN_FACTIONS:
1250 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOOT_EPIC_ITEM:
1251 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_RECEIVE_EPIC_ITEM:
1252 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_NEED:
1253 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_GREED:
1254 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_HEALTH:
1255 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_SPELLPOWER:
1256 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_ARMOR:
1257 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_QUEST_ABANDONED:
1258 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_FLIGHT_PATHS_TAKEN:
1259 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ACCEPTED_SUMMONINGS:
1260 default:
1261 break;
1262 }
1263 return false;
1264}
1265
1266void AchievementMgr::CompletedCriteriaFor(AchievementEntry const* achievement)
1267{
1268 // counter can never complete
1269 if (achievement->flags & ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_COUNTER)
1270 return;
1271
1272 // already completed and stored
1273 if (HasAchieved(achievement->ID))
1274 return;
1275
1276 if (IsCompletedAchievement(achievement))
1277 CompletedAchievement(achievement);
1278}
1279
1280bool AchievementMgr::IsCompletedAchievement(AchievementEntry const* entry)
1281{
1282 // counter can never complete
1283 if (entry->flags & ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_COUNTER)
1284 return false;
1285
1286 // for achievement with referenced achievement criterias get from referenced and counter from self
1287 uint32 achievmentForTestId = entry->refAchievement ? entry->refAchievement : entry->ID;
1288 uint32 achievmentForTestCount = entry->count;
1289
1290 AchievementCriteriaEntryList const* cList = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievementCriteriaByAchievement(achievmentForTestId);
1291 if (!cList)
1292 return false;
1293 uint32 count = 0;
1294
1295 // For SUMM achievements, we have to count the progress of each criteria of the achievement.
1296 // Oddly, the target count is NOT countained in the achievement, but in each individual criteria
1297 if (entry->flags & ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_SUMM)
1298 {
1299 for (AchievementCriteriaEntryList::const_iterator itr = cList->begin(); itr != cList->end(); ++itr)
1300 {
1301 AchievementCriteriaEntry const* criteria = *itr;
1302
1303 CriteriaProgress const* progress = GetCriteriaProgress(criteria);
1304 if (!progress)
1305 continue;
1306
1307 count += progress->counter;
1308
1309 // for counters, field4 contains the main count requirement
1310 if (count >= criteria->raw.count)
1311 return true;
1312 }
1313 return false;
1314 }
1315
1316 // Default case - need complete all or
1317 bool completed_all = true;
1318 for (AchievementCriteriaEntryList::const_iterator itr = cList->begin(); itr != cList->end(); ++itr)
1319 {
1320 AchievementCriteriaEntry const* criteria = *itr;
1321
1322 bool completed = IsCompletedCriteria(criteria, entry);
1323
1324 // found an uncompleted criteria, but DONT return false yet - there might be a completed criteria with ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_COMPLETE_FLAG_ALL
1325 if (completed)
1326 ++count;
1327 else
1328 completed_all = false;
1329
1330 // completed as have req. count of completed criterias
1331 if (achievmentForTestCount > 0 && achievmentForTestCount <= count)
1332 return true;
1333 }
1334
1335 // all criterias completed requirement
1336 if (completed_all && achievmentForTestCount == 0)
1337 return true;
1338
1339 return false;
1340}
1341
1342CriteriaProgress* AchievementMgr::GetCriteriaProgress(AchievementCriteriaEntry const* entry)
1343{
1344 CriteriaProgressMap::iterator iter = m_criteriaProgress.find(entry->ID);
1345
1346 if (iter == m_criteriaProgress.end())
1347 return NULL;
1348
1349 return &(iter->second);
1350}
1351
1352void AchievementMgr::SetCriteriaProgress(AchievementCriteriaEntry const* entry, uint32 changeValue, ProgressType ptype)
1353{
1354 // Don't allow to cheat - doing timed achievements without timer active
1355 TimedAchievementMap::iterator timedIter = m_timedAchievements.find(entry->ID);
1356 if (entry->timeLimit && timedIter == m_timedAchievements.end())
1357 return;
1358
1359 TC_LOG_DEBUG("achievement", "AchievementMgr::SetCriteriaProgress(%u, %u) for (GUID:%u)", entry->ID, changeValue, m_player->GetGUID().GetCounter());
1360
1361 CriteriaProgress* progress = GetCriteriaProgress(entry);
1362 if (!progress)
1363 {
1364 // not create record for 0 counter but allow it for timed achievements
1365 // we will need to send 0 progress to client to start the timer
1366 if (changeValue == 0 && !entry->timeLimit)
1367 return;
1368
1369 progress = &m_criteriaProgress[entry->ID];
1370 progress->counter = changeValue;
1371 }
1372 else
1373 {
1374 uint32 newValue = 0;
1375 switch (ptype)
1376 {
1377 case PROGRESS_SET:
1378 newValue = changeValue;
1379 break;
1380 case PROGRESS_ACCUMULATE:
1381 {
1382 // avoid overflow
1383 uint32 max_value = std::numeric_limits<uint32>::max();
1384 newValue = max_value - progress->counter > changeValue ? progress->counter + changeValue : max_value;
1385 break;
1386 }
1387 case PROGRESS_HIGHEST:
1388 newValue = progress->counter < changeValue ? changeValue : progress->counter;
1389 break;
1390 }
1391
1392 // not update (not mark as changed) if counter will have same value
1393 if (progress->counter == newValue && !entry->timeLimit)
1394 return;
1395
1396 progress->counter = newValue;
1397 }
1398
1399 progress->changed = true;
1400 progress->date = time(NULL); // set the date to the latest update.
1401
1402 uint32 timeElapsed = 0;
1403 bool timedCompleted = false;
1404
1405 if (entry->timeLimit)
1406 {
1407 // has to exist, otherwise we wouldn't be here
1408 timedCompleted = IsCompletedCriteria(entry, sAchievementMgr->GetAchievement(entry->referredAchievement));
1409 // Client expects this in packet
1410 timeElapsed = entry->timeLimit - (timedIter->second/IN_MILLISECONDS);
1411
1412 // Remove the timer, we wont need it anymore
1413 if (timedCompleted)
1414 m_timedAchievements.erase(timedIter);
1415 }
1416
1417 SendCriteriaUpdate(entry, progress, timeElapsed, timedCompleted);
1418}
1419
1420void AchievementMgr::RemoveCriteriaProgress(AchievementCriteriaEntry const* entry)
1421{
1422 if (!entry)
1423 return;
1424
1425 CriteriaProgressMap::iterator criteriaProgress = m_criteriaProgress.find(entry->ID);
1426 if (criteriaProgress == m_criteriaProgress.end())
1427 return;
1428
1429 WorldPacket data(SMSG_CRITERIA_DELETED, 4);
1430 data << uint32(entry->ID);
1431 m_player->SendDirectMessage(&data);
1432
1433 m_criteriaProgress.erase(criteriaProgress);
1434}
1435
1436void AchievementMgr::UpdateTimedAchievements(uint32 timeDiff)
1437{
1438 if (!m_timedAchievements.empty())
1439 {
1440 for (TimedAchievementMap::iterator itr = m_timedAchievements.begin(); itr != m_timedAchievements.end();)
1441 {
1442 // Time is up, remove timer and reset progress
1443 if (itr->second <= timeDiff)
1444 {
1445 AchievementCriteriaEntry const* entry = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievementCriteria(itr->first);
1446 RemoveCriteriaProgress(entry);
1447 m_timedAchievements.erase(itr++);
1448 }
1449 else
1450 {
1451 itr->second -= timeDiff;
1452 ++itr;
1453 }
1454 }
1455 }
1456}
1457
1458void AchievementMgr::StartTimedAchievement(AchievementCriteriaTimedTypes type, uint32 entry, uint32 timeLost /*= 0*/)
1459{
1460 AchievementCriteriaEntryList const& achievementCriteriaList = sAchievementMgr->GetTimedAchievementCriteriaByType(type);
1461 for (AchievementCriteriaEntryList::const_iterator i = achievementCriteriaList.begin(); i != achievementCriteriaList.end(); ++i)
1462 {
1463 if ((*i)->timerStartEvent != entry)
1464 continue;
1465
1466 AchievementEntry const* achievement = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievement((*i)->referredAchievement);
1467 if (m_timedAchievements.find((*i)->ID) == m_timedAchievements.end() && !IsCompletedCriteria(*i, achievement))
1468 {
1469 // Start the timer
1470 if ((*i)->timeLimit * IN_MILLISECONDS > timeLost)
1471 {
1472 m_timedAchievements[(*i)->ID] = (*i)->timeLimit * IN_MILLISECONDS - timeLost;
1473
1474 // and at client too
1475 SetCriteriaProgress(*i, 0, PROGRESS_SET);
1476 }
1477 }
1478 }
1479}
1480
1481void AchievementMgr::RemoveTimedAchievement(AchievementCriteriaTimedTypes type, uint32 entry)
1482{
1483 AchievementCriteriaEntryList const& achievementCriteriaList = sAchievementMgr->GetTimedAchievementCriteriaByType(type);
1484 for (AchievementCriteriaEntryList::const_iterator i = achievementCriteriaList.begin(); i!=achievementCriteriaList.end(); ++i)
1485 {
1486 if ((*i)->timerStartEvent != entry)
1487 continue;
1488
1489 TimedAchievementMap::iterator timedIter = m_timedAchievements.find((*i)->ID);
1490 // We don't have timer for this achievement
1491 if (timedIter == m_timedAchievements.end())
1492 continue;
1493
1494 // remove progress
1495 RemoveCriteriaProgress(*i);
1496
1497 // Remove the timer
1498 m_timedAchievements.erase(timedIter);
1499 }
1500}
1501
1502void AchievementMgr::CompletedAchievement(AchievementEntry const* achievement)
1503{
1504 // disable for gamemasters with GM-mode enabled
1505 if (m_player->IsGameMaster())
1506 return;
1507
1508 if (achievement->flags & ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_COUNTER || HasAchieved(achievement->ID))
1509 return;
1510
1511 TC_LOG_DEBUG("achievement", "AchievementMgr::CompletedAchievement(%u). Player: %s (%u)",
1512 achievement->ID, m_player->GetName().c_str(), m_player->GetGUID().GetCounter());
1513
1514 SendAchievementEarned(achievement);
1515 CompletedAchievementData& ca = m_completedAchievements[achievement->ID];
1516 ca.date = time(NULL);
1517 ca.changed = true;
1518
1519 sAchievementMgr->SetRealmCompleted(achievement, GetPlayer()->GetInstanceId());
1520
1521 UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_ACHIEVEMENT);
1522 UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EARN_ACHIEVEMENT_POINTS, achievement->points);
1523
1524 // reward items and titles if any
1525 AchievementReward const* reward = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievementReward(achievement);
1526
1527 // no rewards
1528 if (!reward)
1529 return;
1530
1531 // titles
1532 //! Currently there's only one achievement that deals with gender-specific titles.
1533 //! Since no common attributes were found, (not even in titleRewardFlags field)
1534 //! we explicitly check by ID. Maybe in the future we could move the achievement_reward
1535 //! condition fields to the condition system.
1536 if (uint32 titleId = reward->titleId[achievement->ID == 1793 ? GetPlayer()->GetByteValue(PLAYER_BYTES_3, 0) : (GetPlayer()->GetTeam() == ALLIANCE ? 0 : 1)])
1537 if (CharTitlesEntry const* titleEntry = sCharTitlesStore.LookupEntry(titleId))
1538 GetPlayer()->SetTitle(titleEntry);
1539
1540 // mail
1541 if (reward->sender)
1542 {
1543 MailDraft draft(reward->mailTemplate);
1544
1545 if (!reward->mailTemplate)
1546 {
1547 // subject and text
1548 std::string subject = reward->subject;
1549 std::string text = reward->text;
1550
1551 int locIdx = GetPlayer()->GetSession()->GetSessionDbLocaleIndex();
1552 if (locIdx >= 0)
1553 {
1554 if (AchievementRewardLocale const* loc = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievementRewardLocale(achievement))
1555 {
1556 ObjectMgr::GetLocaleString(loc->subject, locIdx, subject);
1557 ObjectMgr::GetLocaleString(loc->text, locIdx, text);
1558 }
1559 }
1560
1561 draft = MailDraft(subject, text);
1562 }
1563
1564 SQLTransaction trans = CharacterDatabase.BeginTransaction();
1565
1566 Item* item = reward->itemId ? Item::CreateItem(reward->itemId, 1, GetPlayer()) : NULL;
1567 if (item)
1568 {
1569 // save new item before send
1570 item->SaveToDB(trans); // save for prevent lost at next mail load, if send fail then item will deleted
1571
1572 // item
1573 draft.AddItem(item);
1574 }
1575
1576 draft.SendMailTo(trans, GetPlayer(), MailSender(MAIL_CREATURE, reward->sender));
1577 CharacterDatabase.CommitTransaction(trans);
1578 }
1579}
1580
1581void AchievementMgr::SendAllAchievementData() const
1582{
1583 WorldPacket data(SMSG_ALL_ACHIEVEMENT_DATA, m_completedAchievements.size()*8+4+m_criteriaProgress.size()*38+4);
1584 BuildAllDataPacket(&data);
1585 GetPlayer()->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
1586}
1587
1588void AchievementMgr::SendRespondInspectAchievements(Player* player) const
1589{
1590 WorldPacket data(SMSG_RESPOND_INSPECT_ACHIEVEMENTS, 9+m_completedAchievements.size()*8+4+m_criteriaProgress.size()*38+4);
1591 data << GetPlayer()->GetPackGUID();
1592 BuildAllDataPacket(&data);
1593 player->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
1594}
1595
1596/**
1597 * used by SMSG_RESPOND_INSPECT_ACHIEVEMENT and SMSG_ALL_ACHIEVEMENT_DATA
1598 */
1599void AchievementMgr::BuildAllDataPacket(WorldPacket* data) const
1600{
1601 for (CompletedAchievementMap::const_iterator iter = m_completedAchievements.begin(); iter != m_completedAchievements.end(); ++iter)
1602 {
1603 // Skip hidden achievements
1604 AchievementEntry const* achievement = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievement(iter->first);
1605 if (!achievement || achievement->flags & ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_HIDDEN)
1606 continue;
1607
1608 *data << uint32(iter->first);
1609 data->AppendPackedTime(iter->second.date);
1610 }
1611 *data << int32(-1);
1612
1613 for (CriteriaProgressMap::const_iterator iter = m_criteriaProgress.begin(); iter != m_criteriaProgress.end(); ++iter)
1614 {
1615 *data << uint32(iter->first);
1616 data->appendPackGUID(iter->second.counter);
1617 *data << GetPlayer()->GetPackGUID();
1618 *data << uint32(0);
1619 data->AppendPackedTime(iter->second.date);
1620 *data << uint32(0);
1621 *data << uint32(0);
1622 }
1623
1624 *data << int32(-1);
1625}
1626
1627bool AchievementMgr::HasAchieved(uint32 achievementId) const
1628{
1629 return m_completedAchievements.find(achievementId) != m_completedAchievements.end();
1630}
1631
1632bool AchievementMgr::CanUpdateCriteria(AchievementCriteriaEntry const* criteria, AchievementEntry const* achievement, uint32 miscValue1, uint32 miscValue2, Unit const* unit)
1633{
1634 if (DisableMgr::IsDisabledFor(DISABLE_TYPE_ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA, criteria->ID, nullptr))
1635 {
1636 TC_LOG_TRACE("achievement", "CanUpdateCriteria: (Id: %u Type %s) Disabled",
1637 criteria->ID, AchievementGlobalMgr::GetCriteriaTypeString(criteria->requiredType));
1638 return false;
1639 }
1640
1641 if (achievement->mapID != -1 && GetPlayer()->GetMapId() != uint32(achievement->mapID))
1642 {
1643 TC_LOG_TRACE("achievement", "CanUpdateCriteria: (Id: %u Type %s Achievement %u) Wrong map",
1644 criteria->ID, AchievementGlobalMgr::GetCriteriaTypeString(criteria->requiredType), achievement->ID);
1645 return false;
1646 }
1647
1648 if ((achievement->requiredFaction == ACHIEVEMENT_FACTION_HORDE && GetPlayer()->GetTeam() != HORDE) ||
1649 (achievement->requiredFaction == ACHIEVEMENT_FACTION_ALLIANCE && GetPlayer()->GetTeam() != ALLIANCE))
1650 {
1651 TC_LOG_TRACE("achievement", "CanUpdateCriteria: (Id: %u Type %s Achievement %u) Wrong faction",
1652 criteria->ID, AchievementGlobalMgr::GetCriteriaTypeString(criteria->requiredType), achievement->ID);
1653 return false;
1654 }
1655
1656 if (!RequirementsSatisfied(criteria, achievement, miscValue1, miscValue2, unit))
1657 {
1658 TC_LOG_TRACE("achievement", "CanUpdateCriteria: (Id: %u Type %s) Requirements have not been satisfied",
1659 criteria->ID, AchievementGlobalMgr::GetCriteriaTypeString(criteria->requiredType));
1660 return false;
1661 }
1662
1663 if (!ConditionsSatisfied(criteria))
1664 {
1665 TC_LOG_TRACE("achievement", "CanUpdateCriteria: (Id: %u Type %s) Conditions have not been satisfied",
1666 criteria->ID, AchievementGlobalMgr::GetCriteriaTypeString(criteria->requiredType));
1667 return false;
1668 }
1669
1670 // don't update already completed criteria
1671 if (IsCompletedCriteria(criteria, achievement))
1672 return false;
1673
1674 return true;
1675}
1676
1677bool AchievementMgr::ConditionsSatisfied(AchievementCriteriaEntry const* criteria) const
1678{
1679 for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_CRITERIA_REQUIREMENTS; ++i)
1680 {
1681 if (!criteria->additionalRequirements[i].additionalRequirement_type)
1682 continue;
1683
1684 switch (criteria->additionalRequirements[i].additionalRequirement_type)
1685 {
1686 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_CONDITION_BG_MAP:
1687 if (GetPlayer()->GetMapId() != criteria->additionalRequirements[i].additionalRequirement_value)
1688 return false;
1689 break;
1690 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_CONDITION_NOT_IN_GROUP:
1691 if (GetPlayer()->GetGroup())
1692 return false;
1693 break;
1694 default:
1695 break;
1696 }
1697 }
1698
1699 return true;
1700}
1701
1702bool AchievementMgr::RequirementsSatisfied(AchievementCriteriaEntry const* achievementCriteria, AchievementEntry const* achievement, uint32 miscValue1, uint32 miscValue2, Unit const* unit) const
1703{
1704 switch (AchievementCriteriaTypes(achievementCriteria->requiredType))
1705 {
1706 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_DAILY_QUEST:
1707 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_FALL_WITHOUT_DYING:
1708 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HONORABLE_KILL:
1709 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_RATED_ARENA:
1710 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_VISIT_BARBER_SHOP:
1711 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GET_KILLING_BLOWS:
1712 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_MONEY_FROM_VENDORS:
1713 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GOLD_SPENT_FOR_TALENTS:
1714 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_NUMBER_OF_TALENT_RESETS:
1715 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_MONEY_FROM_QUEST_REWARD:
1716 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GOLD_SPENT_FOR_TRAVELLING:
1717 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GOLD_SPENT_AT_BARBER:
1718 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GOLD_SPENT_FOR_MAIL:
1719 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOOT_MONEY:
1720 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_SPECIAL_PVP_KILL:
1721 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ON_LOGIN:
1722 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_DUEL:
1723 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOSE_DUEL:
1724 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILL_CREATURE_TYPE:
1725 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GOLD_EARNED_BY_AUCTIONS:
1726 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CREATE_AUCTION:
1727 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_AUCTION_BID:
1728 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WON_AUCTIONS:
1729 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_AUCTION_SOLD:
1730 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_NEED:
1731 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_GREED:
1732 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_HIT_DEALT:
1733 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_HIT_RECEIVED:
1734 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_TOTAL_DAMAGE_RECEIVED:
1735 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_HEAL_CAST:
1736 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_TOTAL_HEALING_RECEIVED:
1737 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_HEALING_RECEIVED:
1738 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_QUEST_ABANDONED:
1739 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_FLIGHT_PATHS_TAKEN:
1740 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ACCEPTED_SUMMONINGS:
1741 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_USE_LFD_TO_GROUP_WITH_PLAYERS:
1742 if (!miscValue1)
1743 return false;
1744 break;
1745 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_REACH_LEVEL:
1746 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_ACHIEVEMENT:
1747 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUEST_COUNT:
1748 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_DAILY_QUEST_DAILY:
1749 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_TEAM_RATING:
1750 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_PERSONAL_RATING:
1751 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BUY_BANK_SLOT:
1752 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GAIN_EXALTED_REPUTATION:
1753 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GAIN_REVERED_REPUTATION:
1754 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GAIN_HONORED_REPUTATION:
1755 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KNOWN_FACTIONS:
1756 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EARN_HONORABLE_KILL:
1757 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_GOLD_VALUE_OWNED:
1758 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EARN_ACHIEVEMENT_POINTS:
1759 break;
1760
1761 // specialized cases
1762 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_BG:
1763 if (!miscValue1)
1764 return false;
1765 if (achievementCriteria->win_bg.bgMapID != GetPlayer()->GetMapId())
1766 return false;
1767 break;
1768 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILL_CREATURE:
1769 if (!miscValue1)
1770 return false;
1771 if (achievementCriteria->kill_creature.creatureID != miscValue1)
1772 return false;
1773 break;
1774 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_REACH_SKILL_LEVEL:
1775 if (miscValue1 && miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->reach_skill_level.skillID)
1776 return false;
1777 break;
1778 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LEARN_SKILL_LEVEL:
1779 if (miscValue1 && miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->learn_skill_level.skillID)
1780 return false;
1781 break;
1782 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUESTS_IN_ZONE:
1783 if (miscValue1 && miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->complete_quests_in_zone.zoneID)
1784 return false;
1785 break;
1786 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_BATTLEGROUND:
1787 if (!miscValue1)
1788 return false;
1789 if (GetPlayer()->GetMapId() != achievementCriteria->complete_battleground.mapID)
1790 return false;
1791 break;
1792 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATH_AT_MAP:
1793 if (!miscValue1)
1794 return false;
1795 if (GetPlayer()->GetMapId() != achievementCriteria->death_at_map.mapID)
1796 return false;
1797 break;
1798 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATH:
1799 if (!miscValue1)
1800 return false;
1801 for (uint8 j = 0; j < MAX_ARENA_SLOT; ++j)
1802 {
1803 if (achievIdByArenaSlot[j] == achievement->ID)
1804 {
1805 Battleground* bg = GetPlayer()->GetBattleground();
1806 if (!bg || !bg->isArena() || ArenaTeam::GetSlotByType(bg->GetArenaType()) != j)
1807 return false;
1808 break;
1809 }
1810 }
1811 break;
1812 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATH_IN_DUNGEON:
1813 {
1814 if (!miscValue1)
1815 return false;
1816
1817 Map const* map = GetPlayer()->IsInWorld() ? GetPlayer()->GetMap() : sMapMgr->FindMap(GetPlayer()->GetMapId(), GetPlayer()->GetInstanceId());
1818 if (!map || !map->IsDungeon())
1819 return false;
1820
1821 //FIXME: work only for instances where max == min for players
1822 if (map->ToInstanceMap()->GetMaxPlayers() != achievementCriteria->death_in_dungeon.manLimit)
1823 return false;
1824 break;
1825 }
1826 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILLED_BY_CREATURE:
1827 if (!miscValue1)
1828 return false;
1829 if (miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->killed_by_creature.creatureEntry)
1830 return false;
1831 break;
1832 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILLED_BY_PLAYER:
1833 if (!miscValue1)
1834 return false;
1835 // if team check required: must kill by opposition faction
1836 if (achievement->ID == 318 && miscValue2 == GetPlayer()->GetTeam())
1837 return false;
1838 break;
1839 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATHS_FROM:
1840 if (!miscValue1)
1841 return false;
1842 if (miscValue2 != achievementCriteria->death_from.type)
1843 return false;
1844 break;
1845 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUEST:
1846 // if miscvalues != 0, it contains the questID.
1847 if (miscValue1)
1848 {
1849 if (miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->complete_quest.questID)
1850 return false;
1851 }
1852 else
1853 {
1854 // login case.
1855 if (!GetPlayer()->GetQuestRewardStatus(achievementCriteria->complete_quest.questID))
1856 return false;
1857 }
1858 break;
1859 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET:
1860 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET2:
1861 if (!miscValue1 || miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->be_spell_target.spellID)
1862 return false;
1863 break;
1864 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL:
1865 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL2:
1866 if (!miscValue1 || miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->cast_spell.spellID)
1867 return false;
1868 break;
1869 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LEARN_SPELL:
1870 if (miscValue1 && miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->learn_spell.spellID)
1871 return false;
1872 if (!GetPlayer()->HasSpell(achievementCriteria->learn_spell.spellID))
1873 return false;
1874 break;
1875 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOOT_TYPE:
1876 // miscvalue1=loot_type (note: 0 = LOOT_CORPSE and then it ignored)
1877 // miscvalue2=count of item loot
1878 if (!miscValue1 || !miscValue2)
1879 return false;
1880 if (miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->loot_type.lootType)
1881 return false;
1882 break;
1883 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_OWN_ITEM:
1884 if (miscValue1 && achievementCriteria->own_item.itemID != miscValue1)
1885 return false;
1886 break;
1887 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_USE_ITEM:
1888 if (!miscValue1)
1889 return false;
1890 if (achievementCriteria->use_item.itemID != miscValue1)
1891 return false;
1892 break;
1893 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOOT_ITEM:
1894 if (!miscValue1)
1895 return false;
1896 if (miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->own_item.itemID)
1897 return false;
1898 break;
1899 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EXPLORE_AREA:
1900 {
1901 WorldMapOverlayEntry const* worldOverlayEntry = sWorldMapOverlayStore.LookupEntry(achievementCriteria->explore_area.areaReference);
1902 if (!worldOverlayEntry)
1903 return false;
1904
1905 bool matchFound = false;
1906 for (int j = 0; j < MAX_WORLD_MAP_OVERLAY_AREA_IDX; ++j)
1907 {
1908 AreaTableEntry const* area = sAreaTableStore.LookupEntry(worldOverlayEntry->areatableID[j]);
1909 if (!area)
1910 break;
1911
1912 uint32 playerIndexOffset = uint32(area->exploreFlag) / 32;
1913 if (playerIndexOffset >= PLAYER_EXPLORED_ZONES_SIZE)
1914 continue;
1915
1916 uint32 mask = 1 << (uint32(area->exploreFlag) % 32);
1917 if (GetPlayer()->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_EXPLORED_ZONES_1 + playerIndexOffset) & mask)
1918 {
1919 matchFound = true;
1920 break;
1921 }
1922 }
1923
1924 if (!matchFound)
1925 return false;
1926 break;
1927 }
1928 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GAIN_REPUTATION:
