1929 if (miscValue1 && miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->gain_reputation.factionID)
1930 return false;
1931 break;
1932 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EQUIP_EPIC_ITEM:
1933 // miscvalue1 = itemid
1934 // miscvalue2 = itemSlot
1935 if (!miscValue1)
1936 return false;
1937 if (miscValue2 != achievementCriteria->equip_epic_item.itemSlot)
1938 return false;
1939 break;
1940 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_NEED_ON_LOOT:
1941 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_GREED_ON_LOOT:
1942 // miscvalue1 = itemid
1943 // miscvalue2 = diced value
1944 if (!miscValue1)
1945 return false;
1946 if (miscValue2 != achievementCriteria->roll_greed_on_loot.rollValue)
1947 return false;
1948 break;
1949 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DO_EMOTE:
1950 // miscvalue1 = emote
1951 if (!miscValue1)
1952 return false;
1953 if (miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->do_emote.emoteID)
1954 return false;
1955 break;
1956 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DAMAGE_DONE:
1957 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HEALING_DONE:
1958 if (!miscValue1)
1959 return false;
1960
1961 if (achievementCriteria->additionalRequirements[0].additionalRequirement_type == ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_CONDITION_BG_MAP)
1962 {
1963 if (GetPlayer()->GetMapId() != achievementCriteria->additionalRequirements[0].additionalRequirement_value)
1964 return false;
1965
1966 // map specific case (BG in fact) expected player targeted damage/heal
1967 if (!unit || unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
1968 return false;
1969 }
1970 break;
1971 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EQUIP_ITEM:
1972 if (!miscValue1)
1973 return false;
1974 if (miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->equip_item.itemID)
1975 return false;
1976 break;
1977 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_USE_GAMEOBJECT:
1978 if (!miscValue1)
1979 return false;
1980 if (miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->use_gameobject.goEntry)
1981 return false;
1982 break;
1983 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_FISH_IN_GAMEOBJECT:
1984 if (!miscValue1)
1985 return false;
1986 if (miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->fish_in_gameobject.goEntry)
1987 return false;
1988 break;
1989 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LEARN_SKILLLINE_SPELLS:
1990 if (miscValue1 && miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->learn_skillline_spell.skillLine)
1991 return false;
1992 break;
1993 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOOT_EPIC_ITEM:
1994 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_RECEIVE_EPIC_ITEM:
1995 {
1996 if (!miscValue1)
1997 return false;
1998 ItemTemplate const* proto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(miscValue1);
1999 if (!proto || proto->Quality < ITEM_QUALITY_EPIC)
2000 return false;
2001 break;
2002 }
2003 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LEARN_SKILL_LINE:
2004 if (miscValue1 && miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->learn_skill_line.skillLine)
2005 return false;
2006 break;
2007 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HK_CLASS:
2008 if (!miscValue1 || miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->hk_class.classID)
2009 return false;
2010 break;
2011 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HK_RACE:
2012 if (!miscValue1 || miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->hk_race.raceID)
2013 return false;
2014 break;
2015 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BG_OBJECTIVE_CAPTURE:
2016 if (!miscValue1 || miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->bg_objective.objectiveId)
2017 return false;
2018 break;
2019 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HONORABLE_KILL_AT_AREA:
2020 if (!miscValue1 || miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->honorable_kill_at_area.areaID)
2021 return false;
2022 break;
2023 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_ARENA:
2024 if (miscValue1 != achievementCriteria->win_arena.mapID)
2025 return false;
2026 break;
2027 default:
2028 break;
2029 }
2030
2031 return true;
2032}
2033
2034char const* AchievementGlobalMgr::GetCriteriaTypeString(uint32 type)
2035{
2036 return GetCriteriaTypeString(AchievementCriteriaTypes(type));
2037}
2038
2039char const* AchievementGlobalMgr::GetCriteriaTypeString(AchievementCriteriaTypes type)
2040{
2041 switch (type)
2042 {
2043 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILL_CREATURE:
2044 return "KILL_CREATURE";
2045 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_BG:
2046 return "TYPE_WIN_BG";
2047 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_REACH_LEVEL:
2048 return "REACH_LEVEL";
2049 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_REACH_SKILL_LEVEL:
2050 return "REACH_SKILL_LEVEL";
2051 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_ACHIEVEMENT:
2052 return "COMPLETE_ACHIEVEMENT";
2053 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUEST_COUNT:
2054 return "COMPLETE_QUEST_COUNT";
2055 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_DAILY_QUEST_DAILY:
2056 return "COMPLETE_DAILY_QUEST_DAILY";
2057 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUESTS_IN_ZONE:
2058 return "COMPLETE_QUESTS_IN_ZONE";
2059 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DAMAGE_DONE:
2060 return "DAMAGE_DONE";
2061 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_DAILY_QUEST:
2062 return "COMPLETE_DAILY_QUEST";
2063 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_BATTLEGROUND:
2064 return "COMPLETE_BATTLEGROUND";
2065 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATH_AT_MAP:
2066 return "DEATH_AT_MAP";
2067 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATH:
2068 return "DEATH";
2069 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DEATH_IN_DUNGEON:
2070 return "DEATH_IN_DUNGEON";
2071 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_RAID:

2249//==========================================================
2250void AchievementGlobalMgr::LoadAchievementCriteriaList()
2251{
2252 uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
2253
2254 if (sAchievementCriteriaStore.GetNumRows() == 0)
2255 {
2256 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 achievement criteria.");
2257 return;
2258 }
2259
2260 uint32 loaded = 0;
2261 for (uint32 entryId = 0; entryId < sAchievementCriteriaStore.GetNumRows(); ++entryId)
2262 {
2263 AchievementCriteriaEntry const* criteria = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievementCriteria(entryId);
2264 if (!criteria)
2265 continue;
2266
2267 m_AchievementCriteriasByType[criteria->requiredType].push_back(criteria);
2268 m_AchievementCriteriaListByAchievement[criteria->referredAchievement].push_back(criteria);
2269
2270 if (criteria->timeLimit)
2271 m_AchievementCriteriasByTimedType[criteria->timedType].push_back(criteria);
2272
2273 ++loaded;
2274 }
2275
2276 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u achievement criteria in %u ms.", loaded, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
2277}
2278
2279void AchievementGlobalMgr::LoadAchievementReferenceList()
2280{
2281 uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
2282
2283 if (sAchievementStore.GetNumRows() == 0)
2284 {
2285 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 achievement references.");
2286 return;
2287 }
2288
2289 uint32 count = 0;
2290
2291 for (uint32 entryId = 0; entryId < sAchievementStore.GetNumRows(); ++entryId)
2292 {
2293 AchievementEntry const* achievement = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievement(entryId);
2294 if (!achievement || !achievement->refAchievement)
2295 continue;
2296
2297 m_AchievementListByReferencedId[achievement->refAchievement].push_back(achievement);
2298 ++count;
2299 }
2300
2301 // Once Bitten, Twice Shy (10 player) - Icecrown Citadel
2302 if (AchievementEntry const* achievement = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievement(4539))
2303 const_cast<AchievementEntry*>(achievement)->mapID = 631; // Correct map requirement (currently has Ulduar)
2304
2305 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u achievement references in %u ms.", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
2306}
2307
2308void AchievementGlobalMgr::LoadAchievementCriteriaData()
2309{
2310 uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
2311
2312 m_criteriaDataMap.clear(); // need for reload case
2313
2314 QueryResult result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT criteria_id, type, value1, value2, ScriptName FROM achievement_criteria_data");
2315
2316 if (!result)
2317 {
2318 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 additional achievement criteria data. DB table `achievement_criteria_data` is empty.");
2319 return;
2320 }
2321
2322 uint32 count = 0;
2323
2324 do
2325 {
2326 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2327 uint32 criteria_id = fields[0].GetUInt32();
2328
2329 AchievementCriteriaEntry const* criteria = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievementCriteria(criteria_id);
2330
2331 if (!criteria)
2332 {
2333 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` contains data for non-existing criteria (Entry: %u). Ignored.", criteria_id);
2334 continue;
2335 }
2336
2337 uint32 dataType = fields[1].GetUInt8();
2338 std::string scriptName = fields[4].GetString();
2339 uint32 scriptId = 0;
2340 if (scriptName.length()) // not empty
2341 {
2342 if (dataType != ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_SCRIPT)
2343 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` contains a ScriptName for non-scripted data type (Entry: %u, type %u), useless data.", criteria_id, dataType);
2344 else
2345 scriptId = sObjectMgr->GetScriptId(scriptName);
2346 }
2347
2348 AchievementCriteriaData data(dataType, fields[2].GetUInt32(), fields[3].GetUInt32(), scriptId);
2349
2350 if (!data.IsValid(criteria))
2351 continue;
2352
2353 // this will allocate empty data set storage
2354 AchievementCriteriaDataSet& dataSet = m_criteriaDataMap[criteria_id];
2355 dataSet.SetCriteriaId(criteria_id);
2356
2357 // add real data only for not NONE data types
2358 if (data.dataType != ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_DATA_TYPE_NONE)
2359 dataSet.Add(data);
2360
2361 // counting data by and data types
2362 ++count;
2363 }
2364 while (result->NextRow());
2365
2366 // post loading checks
2367 for (uint32 entryId = 0; entryId < sAchievementCriteriaStore.GetNumRows(); ++entryId)
2368 {
2369 AchievementCriteriaEntry const* criteria = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievementCriteria(entryId);
2370 if (!criteria)
2371 continue;
2372
2373 switch (criteria->requiredType)
2374 {
2375 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILL_CREATURE:
2376 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_BG:
2377 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_FALL_WITHOUT_DYING:
2378 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET:
2379 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL:
2380 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BG_OBJECTIVE_CAPTURE:
2381 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HONORABLE_KILL:
2382 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EQUIP_EPIC_ITEM:
2383 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_NEED_ON_LOOT:
2384 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ROLL_GREED_ON_LOOT:
2385 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GET_KILLING_BLOWS:
2386 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET2:
2387 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_SPECIAL_PVP_KILL:
2388 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_ON_LOGIN:
2389 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILL_CREATURE_TYPE:
2390 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL2:
2391 // achievement requires db data
2392 break;
2393 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUEST:
2394 {
2395 AchievementEntry const* achievement = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievement(criteria->referredAchievement);
2396 if (!achievement)
2397 continue;
2398
2399 // There are many achievements with these criteria, use hardcoded check at this moment to pick a simple case
2400 if (achievement->ID == 1282)
2401 break;
2402
2403 continue;
2404 }
2405 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_RATED_ARENA: // need skip generic cases
2406 if (criteria->additionalRequirements[0].additionalRequirement_type != ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_CONDITION_NO_LOSE)
2407 continue;
2408 break;
2409 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DO_EMOTE: // need skip generic cases
2410 if (criteria->do_emote.count == 0)
2411 continue;
2412 break;
2413 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_WIN_DUEL: // skip statistics
2414 if (criteria->win_duel.duelCount == 0)
2415 continue;
2416 break;
2417 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOOT_TYPE: // need skip generic cases
2418 if (criteria->loot_type.lootTypeCount != 1)
2419 continue;
2420 break;
2421 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_DAILY_QUEST:
2422 case ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_USE_ITEM: // only Children's Week achievements
2423 {
2424 AchievementEntry const* achievement = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievement(criteria->referredAchievement);
2425 if (!achievement)
2426 continue;
2427 if (achievement->categoryId != CATEGORY_CHILDRENS_WEEK && achievement->ID != 1785)
2428 continue;
2429 break;
2430 }
2431 default: // type not use DB data, ignore
2432 continue;
2433 }
2434
2435 if (!GetCriteriaDataSet(criteria) && !DisableMgr::IsDisabledFor(DISABLE_TYPE_ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA, entryId, NULL))
2436 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_criteria_data` does not contain expected data for criteria (Entry: %u Type: %u) for achievement %u.", criteria->ID, criteria->requiredType, criteria->referredAchievement);
2437 }
2438
2439 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u additional achievement criteria data in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
2440}
2441
2442void AchievementGlobalMgr::LoadCompletedAchievements()
2443{
2444 uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
2445
2446 QueryResult result = CharacterDatabase.Query("SELECT achievement FROM character_achievement GROUP BY achievement");
2447
2448 if (!result)
2449 {
2450 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 realm first completed achievements. DB table `character_achievement` is empty.");
2451 return;
2452 }
2453
2454 do
2455 {
2456 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2457
2458 uint16 achievementId = fields[0].GetUInt16();
2459 const AchievementEntry* achievement = sAchievementMgr->GetAchievement(achievementId);
2460 if (!achievement)
2461 {
2462 // Remove non-existing achievements from all characters
2463 TC_LOG_ERROR("achievement", "Non-existing achievement %u data has been removed from the table `character_achievement`.", achievementId);
2464
2465 PreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_DEL_INVALID_ACHIEVMENT);
2466 stmt->setUInt16(0, uint16(achievementId));
2467 CharacterDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2468
2469 continue;
2470 }
2471 else if (achievement->flags & (ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_REALM_FIRST_REACH | ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_REALM_FIRST_KILL))
2472 m_allCompletedAchievements[achievementId] = uint32(0xFFFFFFFF);
2473 }
2474 while (result->NextRow());
2475
2476 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %lu realm first completed achievements in %u ms.", (unsigned long)m_allCompletedAchievements.size(), GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
2477}
2478
2479void AchievementGlobalMgr::LoadRewards()
2480{
2481 uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
2482
2483 m_achievementRewards.clear(); // need for reload case
2484
2485 // 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7
2486 QueryResult result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT entry, title_A, title_H, item, sender, subject, text, mailTemplate FROM achievement_reward");
2487
2488 if (!result)
2489 {
2490 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 achievement rewards. DB table `achievement_reward` is empty.");
2491 return;
2492 }
2493
2494 uint32 count = 0;
2495
2496 do
2497 {
2498 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2499 uint32 entry = fields[0].GetUInt32();
2500 AchievementEntry const* achievement = GetAchievement(entry);
2501 if (!achievement)
2502 {
2503 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_reward` contains a wrong achievement entry (Entry: %u), ignored.", entry);
2504 continue;
2505 }
2506
2507 AchievementReward reward;
2508 reward.titleId[0] = fields[1].GetUInt32();
2509 reward.titleId[1] = fields[2].GetUInt32();
2510 reward.itemId = fields[3].GetUInt32();
2511 reward.sender = fields[4].GetUInt32();
2512 reward.subject = fields[5].GetString();
2513 reward.text = fields[6].GetString();
2514 reward.mailTemplate = fields[7].GetUInt32();
2515
2516 // must be title or mail at least
2517 if (!reward.titleId[0] && !reward.titleId[1] && !reward.sender)
2518 {
2519 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_reward` (Entry: %u) does not contain title or item reward data. Ignored.", entry);
2520 continue;
2521 }
2522
2523 if (achievement->requiredFaction == ACHIEVEMENT_FACTION_ANY && (!reward.titleId[0] ^ !reward.titleId[1]))
2524 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_reward` (Entry: %u) contains the title (A: %u H: %u) for only one team.", entry, reward.titleId[0], reward.titleId[1]);
2525
2526 if (reward.titleId[0])
2527 {
2528 CharTitlesEntry const* titleEntry = sCharTitlesStore.LookupEntry(reward.titleId[0]);
2529 if (!titleEntry)
2530 {
2531 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_reward` (Entry: %u) contains an invalid title id (%u) in `title_A`, set to 0", entry, reward.titleId[0]);
2532 reward.titleId[0] = 0;
2533 }
2534 }
2535
2536 if (reward.titleId[1])
2537 {
2538 CharTitlesEntry const* titleEntry = sCharTitlesStore.LookupEntry(reward.titleId[1]);
2539 if (!titleEntry)
2540 {
2541 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_reward` (Entry: %u) contains an invalid title id (%u) in `title_H`, set to 0", entry, reward.titleId[1]);
2542 reward.titleId[1] = 0;
2543 }
2544 }
2545
2546 //check mail data before item for report including wrong item case
2547 if (reward.sender)
2548 {
2549 if (!sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(reward.sender))
2550 {
2551 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_reward` (Entry: %u) contains an invalid creature entry %u as sender, mail reward skipped.", entry, reward.sender);
2552 reward.sender = 0;
2553 }
2554 }
2555 else
2556 {
2557 if (reward.itemId)
2558 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_reward` (Entry: %u) does not have sender data, but contains an item reward. Item will not be rewarded.", entry);
2559
2560 if (!reward.subject.empty())
2561 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_reward` (Entry: %u) does not have sender data, but contains a mail subject.", entry);
2562
2563 if (!reward.text.empty())
2564 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_reward` (Entry: %u) does not have sender data, but contains mail text.", entry);
2565
2566 if (reward.mailTemplate)
2567 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_reward` (Entry: %u) does not have sender data, but has a mailTemplate.", entry);
2568 }
2569
2570 if (reward.mailTemplate)
2571 {
2572 if (!sMailTemplateStore.LookupEntry(reward.mailTemplate))
2573 {
2574 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_reward` (Entry: %u) is using an invalid mailTemplate (%u).", entry, reward.mailTemplate);
2575 reward.mailTemplate = 0;
2576 }
2577 else if (!reward.subject.empty() || !reward.text.empty())
2578 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_reward` (Entry: %u) is using mailTemplate (%u) and mail subject/text.", entry, reward.mailTemplate);
2579 }
2580
2581 if (reward.itemId)
2582 {
2583 if (!sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(reward.itemId))
2584 {
2585 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `achievement_reward` (Entry: %u) contains an invalid item id %u, reward mail will not contain the rewarded item.", entry, reward.itemId);
2586 reward.itemId = 0;
2587 }
2588 }
2589
2590 m_achievementRewards[entry] = reward;
2591 ++count;
2592 }
2593 while (result->NextRow());
2594
2595 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u achievement rewards in %u ms.", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
2596}
2597
2598void AchievementGlobalMgr::LoadRewardLocales()
2599{
2600 uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
2601
2602 m_achievementRewardLocales.clear(); // need for reload case
2603
2604 QueryResult result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT entry, subject_loc1, text_loc1, subject_loc2, text_loc2, subject_loc3, text_loc3, subject_loc4, text_loc4, "
2605 "subject_loc5, text_loc5, subject_loc6, text_loc6, subject_loc7, text_loc7, subject_loc8, text_loc8"
2606 " FROM locales_achievement_reward");
2607
2608 if (!result)
2609 {
2610 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 achievement reward locale strings. DB table `locales_achievement_reward` is empty.");
2611 return;
2612 }
2613
2614 do
2615 {
2616 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2617
2618 uint32 entry = fields[0].GetUInt32();
2619
2620 if (m_achievementRewards.find(entry) == m_achievementRewards.end())
2621 {
2622 TC_LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `locales_achievement_reward` (Entry: %u) contains locale strings for a non-existing achievement reward.", entry);
2623 continue;
2624 }
2625
2626 AchievementRewardLocale& data = m_achievementRewardLocales[entry];
2627
2628 for (uint8 i = TOTAL_LOCALES - 1; i > 0; --i)
2629 {
2630 LocaleConstant locale = (LocaleConstant) i;
2631 ObjectMgr::AddLocaleString(fields[1 + 2 * (i - 1)].GetString(), locale, data.subject);
2632 ObjectMgr::AddLocaleString(fields[1 + 2 * (i - 1) + 1].GetString(), locale, data.text);
2633 }
2634 }
2635 while (result->NextRow());
2636
2637 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u achievement reward locale strings in %u ms.", uint32(m_achievementRewardLocales.size()), GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
2638}

2641{
2642 return sAchievementStore.LookupEntry(achievementId);
2643}

2650void AchievementGlobalMgr::OnInstanceDestroyed(uint32 instanceId)
2651{
2652 for (auto& realmCompletion : m_allCompletedAchievements)
2653 if (realmCompletion.second == instanceId)
2654 realmCompletion.second = uint32(0xFFFFFFFF);
2655}
